name: Lemon-Head in SPACE
description:
Our adventure begins with Alien Frogs invading earth. Lemon-Head needs to ready his StarLemon ship to defend earth at all costs. Use strategy to absorb enemy lasers and use their own weapons against them in this sci-fi shooter.

Comment your high scores!

Controls
LEFT/RIGHT/UP/DOWN: Change Direction
Z: Shoot
X: Switch Color
SPACE: X-Bomb
ESC: Menu

Tutorial
- Switch your color to become immune to the color type
- Absorb damage of the same color to increase your X-Bomb power
- Using the X-Bomb destroys all enemies on the screen
- Destroy enemies of the same color to receive bonus points

Download the source code below
